DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim is to study the specific lung elastance in ALI/ARDS patients during invasive mechanical ventilation, in supine and prone position.
DOC.brief_title: The Specific Lung Elastance in Acute Lung Injury/Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ALI/ARDS) Patients in Supine and Prone Position
DOC.detailed_description: In sedated and paralyzed ALI/ARDS patients, we study and compare the specific lung elastance in supine and prone position during invasive mechanical ventilation.
DOC.criteria: ALI/ARDS patients during invasive mechanical ventilation Haemodynamic failure, pneumothorax
